messages.text: Hi Neha, the shipment is confirmed. My uncle gave me another great crypto tip, we should discuss it tonight.
Sorry, I think you have the wrong number. I'm not Neha.
Oh my goodness, I am so sorry! My apologies. It seems fate has made us meet. I'm Sophia.
No problem. I'm Rajesh.
A strong name! Well, it was nice to accidentally meet you, Rajesh. I am a wine trader from Singapore, currently enjoying a vacation in Bali.
Just closed another amazing trade on the BTC/ETH pair. This vacation is paying for itself! How is your day, Rajesh?
My day is fine, just work. You trade crypto?
Oh yes, it's my main passion. My uncle is a financial analyst and he gives me insider information. The returns are incredible. It has given me financial freedom.
That sounds nice. I've heard it's very risky.
Not if you have the right information! It's only risky for the uninformed. My uncle's analysis is never wrong.
You seem like a smart and hardworking man, Rajesh. You deserve to enjoy life more. Have you ever thought about investing?
A little, in mutual funds. Nothing major.
Mutual funds are so slow. Listen, my uncle just told me about a new coin that is about to explode. It's a secret, only for a few investors.
Because you have been so kind to me, a stranger, I want to share this opportunity with you. I can guide you.
I don't know anything about crypto trading.
You don't need to! I will tell you exactly what to do. It's foolproof. You just need to download this trading app, CoinMaxPro. It is the platform we use.
What kind of money do you need to start?
You can start with a small amount, maybe $500 (around ₹40,000) to see how it works. You will see the profit in hours. But we must act now, the price is rising as we speak.
Let me think about it.
Rajesh, opportunity waits for no one. This is a life-changing chance. Trust me. Let's do this together. I will walk you through setting up the account right now.
Okay... where do I find this app?
Excellent! I am sending you the link. Use my referral code for a special bonus. You are making the best decision of your life.
Hi Rajesh, did you deposit the funds? The signal is very strong today, we must buy immediately!
The price is going up! Quick!
Doing it now.
